## From Python to Production AI Systems

**Modern AI Engineering** is a full-stack AI & Data Science curriculum designed to
take you from **beginner foundations** to **job-ready AI engineer**.

This course emphasizes:
- strong mathematical intuition
- hands-on coding
- real-world AI systems (LLMs, RAG, MLOps)

---

## Who This Course Is For

- Beginners entering AI & Data Science
- Software engineers transitioning to ML/AI
- Professionals preparing for AI interviews and projects

---

## What You Will Build

- End-to-end ML pipelines
- Deep learning models
- NLP & Generative AI systems
- LLM-powered applications with RAG
- Production-aware AI workflows
